song_lyrics: Sakhī joīne chitta mārā lobhiyā jo... 2
Me to ṭāḷyo ghunghaṭ paṭ āḍalo jo,
Prīte pūjyā Prītam Var lāḍlo jo... 3
Māro bhavno te dorḍo chhoḍiyo jo,
Je je kār thayo chhe Tribhuvanmā jo... 5
title: Sakhī Albelojī toraṇ āviyā jo

metadata.kirtan_info:
2-210: Sadguru Premanand Swami

Category: Avi Aksharvarni Jan
